course_description: Examines the thought and art of one of Russia's most influential writers. In works such as War and Peace and Anna Karenina, Tolstoy offers insight into issues still fundamental to us today: the meaning of life and death, moral and social responsibility, and personal identity.
sections: Class Nbr: 3595, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:20a-12:35p, Instructor: V. Proskurina, Status: Open
